QuestData.Title: It's Melon Time
QuestData.Description: <Farmer Yoon looks up at the sky and sniffs the air.>$b$bHmm...$b$b<He licks his paw and holds it up in the air, sticks a toenail into the soil, and then inspects the length of his shadow.>$b$bYup. It's melon time.$b$bCould you grab some seeds and help me plant a Striped Melon?
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Striped Melon in Sunsong Ranch. You can purchase seeds from Merchant Greenfield in the Halfhill Market.
